result.title: Question about Polygon
result.content:
Hi, I just have one question about Polygon. Is there a way to specify (through testsets or whatever) which tests get run on solutions during contests? I noticed that at the end of even a mashup contest there's something that says "System testing 100%." Is there a way to make something happen during that time, or is that currently not implemented?

Thanks for any suggestions, answers, or alternative solutions you have to offer.
